user.title: Reveal
user.name: Reveal
user.tooltip: Start a new conversation by revealing your intent.

user.title: Revise
user.name: Revise
user.tooltip: Make a correction about your intent.

user.title: Interpret
user.name: Interpret
user.tooltip: Answer a clarifying question or respond to product recommendations from the system.

user.title: Inquire
user.name: Inquire
user.tooltip: Inquire about the response from the system.

system.title: Clarify
system.name: Clarify
system.tooltip: Choose some suggested aspects and ask the user a clarifying question.

system.title: No answer
system.name: No answer
system.tooltip: Cannot find related products to meet user's need.

system.title: Recommend
system.name: Recommend
system.tooltip: Recommend some products to the user. Only select this one when you want to recommend some products from search results.

system.title: Inquire
system.name: Inquire
system.tooltip: Inquire about the response from the user.
